title: Google\Cloud\GkeBackup\V1\BackupPlan\Schedule
name: Schedule
description:
Schedule defines scheduling parameters for automatically creating Backups via this BackupPlan.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gkebackup.v1.BackupPlan.Schedule

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.cron_schedule
params.description: A standard cron string that defines a repeating schedule for creating Backups via this BackupPlan. Default (empty): no automatic backup creation will occur.

params.name: data.paused
params.description: This flag denotes whether automatic Backup creation is paused for this BackupPlan. Default: False

methods.name: getCronSchedule
methods.description:

Default (empty): no automatic backup creation will occur.
